bio: Winterhold's frigid embrace sculpted my destiny as an Ulfhednar warrior, Cobalt Haugher, on a quest to carve my name as Skyrim's mightiest. Proficient in two-handed weapons and light armor, my journey through the chilling nights carried a personal challenge – a fear of the cold. Confronting the frosty abyss, I spent a night in the ruins of Saarthal, emerging resilient against the biting winds of fear.
name: Cobalt Haugher
